item.description:
Beginners in Clothing Designs and Fashion Merchandising-a collaboration between Fashion 2010
Meetup and Boston Fashion Meetup

From many requests and questions, we decided to make the March 17th
Designers meetup for Beginners! – beginners in fashion clothing design
and fashion merchandising. The first thing that designers and
merchandisers must learn to do very well, is evaluation – yet
circumstances and individuality are continually different, making
choices difficult. Let’s have some fun learning how each other
evaluates fashion clothing designs.

First RSVP now, because we are limited in attendees. Then start now
looking around for photo clips from magazines or print off from
Internet fashion sites to bring to the meetup. Each of you bring
something in the following three categories:
1. At least one photo of a fashion clothing design you really love. If
you have more than one then choose which is number one.
2. At least one photo of a fashion clothing design you hate. Again, if
you have more than one then choose which is the worst.
3. A few photos that demonstrate what you believe will be successful
trends. Right now top designers are showing Fall 2010 and stores are
showing Spring 2010.

We look forward to a fun and productive learning time, Wednesday,
March 17, 6 PM at Starbucks.
item.name: Beginners in Clothing Design & Fashion Merchandising
